gen:link.msg:message: `IncomeTaxExpense` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIncomeTaxExpenseBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_IncomeTaxExpense')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIncomeTaxExpenseBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_IncomeTaxExpense return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIncomeTaxExpenseBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIncomeTaxExpenseDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIncomeTaxExpenseBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIncomeTaxExpenseDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIncomeTaxExpenseBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIncomeTaxExpenseCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIncomeTaxExpenseBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIncomeTaxExpenseCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
